column2: Publishes description of how the facility audit process works
column3: Discloses criteria for taking on new facilities before production commences to ensure the facility meets policies and standards
column4: Discloses % of audits that are announced, semi-announced or unannounced
column5: Discloses % of facilities beyond tier 1 (e.g. tier 2/3/4 by which we mean processing facilities, textile mills, laundries and dye houses, suppliers of raw materials, farms) which are audited
column6: Discloses number or % of workers interviewed offsite as part of audits
column7: % of audits which included a trade union representative
